name: Cat Out The Bag
description:
Cat Out The Bag is inspired by our cute and lovable pets. The aim is to guide the cat, using lasers, through various obstacles.

Simply select PLAY GAME to start at level 1. Each level gets progressively more difficult as tricky new obstacles are added. Be careful of other lasers that might distract your cat! To win a level, guide your cat through the tunnel.

To switch lasers, click on the respective number key. Eg. to select the first laser that appears in the game, click "1".  To switch to the second laser, click "2" and so on. Alternatively, switch between lasers by clicking "A" or "D".

P.S. Level 4 is passable.

Have fun!

Made by:

Mikayla Narothan

Johann Schepers

Sandy Singh

Sean Groenewald
